guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for piroxicam and CYP2C9

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily C member 9

text.html: "In patients who are known or suspected to be poor CYP2C9 metabolizers based on genotype or previous history/experience with other CYP2C9 substrates (such as warfarin and phenytoin) consider dose reduction as they may have abnormally high plasma levels due to reduced metabolic clearance." See label for more information.
